installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# starmade Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

apk update
apt add wget curl

rm -rf /bin/dd 
rm -rf /usr/bin/fallocate 
rm -rf /usr/bin/truncate

wget -O starter.jar https://files.star-made.org/StarMade-Starter.jar

java -jar starter.jar -nogui

mv ./StarMade/* ./
rm -r ./StarMade

## install end
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"
